message.body: Hi, this is Noelie. We are in the train between the airport and Philadelphia! When and when shall we meet?
Cool! I am at my studio for another hour at least...do you have a lot of stuff? I can be at my place by 7 if you can wait till then?
You work on sundays? It is good take your time, we can wait and our packs have wheels . See you tonight then!
Will be home by 8 at latest....for real this time
